title: Strengthening Customer Service Competencies: Optimized Machine Learning Techniques for Heart Disease Prediction Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Analysis and Machine Learning Concepts, with Python/Jupyter Notebook Experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of combining CNN model architecture with optimization algorithms (GHO) and propose utilization strategies.
Learners can build a Cleveland Dataset analysis pipeline by applying medical data preprocessing and feature engineering techniques.
Learners can design a heart disease prediction classification model with over 85% accuracy and interpret performance metrics (accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
